author: Andreas Beil
description: A classic Negroni turned festive with added Christmassy flavours. A proper Christmas cracker!
name: Christmas Negroni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk or block ice)
